description: This function extracts a substring from a string using a regex expression.

inputs.description: The input string(s) from which to extract the desired values.
inputs.name: input_string

inputs.description: The regex pattern to use to extract the desired value(s) from the input_string.
inputs.name: regex

inputs.description:
Flags as a parameter to the python re function. If using multiple flags, then separate them with a comma or | character.

Examples:

re.ASCII
re.IGNORECASE
re.MULTILINE
re.DOTALL
re.VERBOSE
re.LOCALE
inputs.name: regex_flags

outputs.description: The regex extracted section of the input string.
